Html:
Hello Yves,

Is there any possibility do add another field to Bibliography for book (book section)?

If I had a book like this:

Author: Douglas R. Frayne

Title: Sargonic and Gutian Periods

City: Toronto

Year: 1993

Series: Royal Inscriptions of Mesopotamia Early Periods

Volume: 2

I can't add the name of book series into citation nor into bibliography. What can I do with this?

Yes.

Before Microsoft released their new version of APA which supports DOI, I published a proof of concept illustrating how it could be done.

The full 'article' describing all the steps involved can be found at http://groups.google.com/group/microsoft.public.word.docmanagement/browse_thread/thread/8a28a5a9a2a607d7/5b594105d46d9ba7?hl=en . Just do a search on "DOI" on that page and read the rather long post.

Unless you have some xml/xslt knowledge, it is going to be a hard thing to do but not impossible.
